title: Hard to Love You
description: A second chance sports romance…Hailey Taylor's heart has always belonged to Mason Cahill. Unfortunately, sometimes love just isn’t enough. Things on the baseball field come easy for Mason, but the rest of his life isn’t that simple. Now, he carries the burden of a secret that can destroy everything between him and Hailey. Their love isn't sweet and simple. It's hot, loud…it’s messy. Sparks fly. Tempers flare. Hearts shatter. One thing is certain…nothing will ever be the same.
author: Megan   Smith
